data.actual_result: If you close the attachlents menu by tapping Back button, you won't get an animation, but if you close it by tapping the emoty space above the menu, it closes making a slide down animation
data.expected_result: The animation should be the same no matter how you close it
data.short_description: There's no animation when the attachment menu closes if you close it using the Back button, while there is one if you close it by tapping the empty space above the menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and tap the add attachment button (+)  - Press Back button of your phone to close the menu. Notice how the menu closes abruptly without animation - Reopen the menu - Now close it by tapping the empty area above the menu. Notice how the menu makes a slide down animation when closing
